about_the_game:
Idol hands 2 -Original Soundtrack-
This is the original soundtrack of the theme song "戀愛禁行" of "Idol hands 2", including mp3 and wav formats.
Contains 12 vocal songs, created by Jili Studio, bilingual in Chinese and Japanese, and has dual heroine + rock/lyrical versions
There are also 2 pieces of pure music, a total of 10 pieces are included

Notice
This extra content only includes 12 original songs + 2 pure music content for the purpose of falling in love with the manager is absolutely forbidden 2
Other songs used in the game are not included in this bonus content

content_descriptors.notes: The game contains Nudity or Sexual Content, All characters are over 20 years old.
